sen.j: 三柱鳥居（みはしらとりい）は、鳥居を3基組み合わせたもの。
sen.e: Mihashira-torii (literally, three-column shrine gate) is formed by coupling three trii.
Mihashira-torii (literally, three-column shrine gate) is formed by coupling three trii.
Mihashira-torii (literally, three-column shrine gate) is formed by coupling three torii (shrine gate).
sen.cmt: 鳥居→torii (shrine gate) と補足しました。

sen.j: 隣り合う鳥居同士が柱を共有する為、柱は6本ではなく3本となる。
sen.e: Because adjacent two trii share columns, the columns are not six but three.
Because adjacent two trii share columns, the columns are not six but three.
Because adjacent two trii share columns, the columns are not six but three.

sen.j: 木嶋神社（蚕の社、京都府京都市）にあるものなどが有名。
sen.e: Mihashira-torii such as the one in Kijima-jinja shrine (kaiko-no-yashiro (literally, silkworm shrine) in Kyoto City in Kyoto Prefecture) is famous.
Mihashira-torii such as the one in Kijima-jinja shrine (kaiko-no-yashiro (literally, silkworm shrine) in Kyoto City in Kyoto Prefecture) is famous.
Mihashira-torii such as the one in Kijima-jinja Shrine (kaiko-no-yashiro (literally, silkworm shrine) in Kyoto City in Kyoto Prefecture) is famous.
sen.cmt: Shrine 大文字にしました。

sen.j: 鳥居の形式は神明鳥居なので、貫が柱の内側にしかない。
sen.e: The style of torii of mihashira-torii is shinmei-torii and, therefore, nuki (a lateral bar joining columns) is only set the inner space of columns.
The style of torii of mihashira-torii is shinmei-torii and, therefore, nuki (a lateral bar joining columns) is only set the inner space of columns.
The style of torii of mihashira-torii is shinmei-torii and, therefore, nuki (a lateral bar joining columns) is only set in the inner space of columns.
sen.cmt: in the inner space としました。

sen.e: Main mihashira-torii
Main mihashira-torii
Main mihashira-torii
Kijima-jinja shrine
Kijima-jinja shrine
Kijima-jinja Shrine
sen.cmt: Shrine 大文字にしました。

sen.j: 木嶋神社は、京都市右京区太秦にある神社。
sen.e: Kijima-jinja shrine is a shrine located in Uzumasa in Ukyo Ward in Kyoto City.
Kijima-jinja shrine is a shrine located in Uzumasa in Ukyo Ward in Kyoto City.
Kijima-jinja Shrine is a shrine located in Uzumasa in Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City.
sen.cmt: Shrine 大文字にしました。

sen.j: 石造りの三柱鳥居が境内の「元糺の池」（もとただすのいけ）の中に建てられている。
sen.e: Mihashira-torii made of stone stands in 'Mototadasu-no-ike pond' in the precincts of the shrine.
Mihashira-torii made of stone stands in 'Mototadasu-no-ike pond' in the precincts of the shrine.
Mihashira-torii made of stone stands in 'Mototadasu-no-ike pond' in the precincts of the shrine.

sen.j: 現在のものは1831年に再建されたものだが、「北斎漫画」十一集「三才鳥居」に描かれているものは木造となっている。
sen.e: Though the current mihashira-torii is the one which was constructed in 1831 after the original one, the one depicted in 'Sansai-torii' which is the 11th volume of 'Hokusai-manga' (a collection of Hokusai's ukiyoe) is made of wood.

Though the current mihashira-torii is the one which was constructed in 1831 after the original one, the one depicted in 'Sansai-torii' which is the 11th volume of 'Hokusai-manga' (a collection of Hokusai's ukiyoe) is made of wood.

Although the current mihashira-torii is the one which was constructed in 1831 after the original one, the one depicted in 'Sansai-torii' which is the 11th volume of 'Hokusai Manga' (a collection of Hokusai KATSUSHIKA's sketches) is made of wood.
sen.cmt: 北斎漫画→a collection of Hokusai KATSUSHIKA's sketches としました。

sen.e: Mikakoi-jinja shrine
Mikakoi-jinja shrine
Mikakoi-jinja Shrine
sen.cmt: Shrine 大文字にしました。

sen.j: 三囲神社は、東京都墨田区向島 (墨田区)にある神社。
sen.e: Mikakoi-jinja shrine is a shrine located in Mukojima (Sumida Ward) in Sumida Ward in Tokyo.
Mikakoi-jinja shrine is a shrine located in Mukojima (Sumida Ward) in Sumida Ward in Tokyo.
Mikakoi-jinja Shrine is a shrine located in Mukojima (Sumida Ward) in Sumida Ward, Tokyo.
sen.cmt: Shrine 大文字にしました。

sen.j: 石造りの三柱鳥居があり、鳥居に囲まれるように井戸が設けられている。
sen.e: There is mihashira-torii made of stone in the shrine and a well is provided surrounded by the torii.
There is mihashira-torii made of stone in the shrine and a well is provided surrounded by the torii.
There is mihashira-torii made of stone in the shrine and a well is provided surrounded by the torii.

sen.j: 三井家の守護神として崇められていることもあり、鳥居には「三角石鳥居。三井邸より移す。原形は京都・太秦 木島神社にある」と書かれている。
sen.e: This mihashira-torii is worshipped as the guardian god of the MITSUI family and it is written on the shrine that 'A triangular stone torii. Moved from the MITSUI House. The original is located in Kijima-jinja shrine in Uzumasa in Kyoto'.

This mihashira-torii is worshipped as the guardian god of the MITSUI family and it is written on the shrine that 'A triangular stone torii. Moved from the MITSUI House. The original is located in Kijima-jinja shrine in Uzumasa in Kyoto'.

This mihashira-torii is worshipped as the guardian god of the Mitsui family and it is written on the shrine that 'A triangular stone torii. Moved from the Mitsui House. The original is located in Kijima-jinja Shrine in Uzumasa in Kyoto.'
Yamato Town in Gifu Prefecture
Yamato Town in Gifu Prefecture
Yamato-cho in Gifu Prefecture

sen.j: 大和町 (岐阜県)にある三柱鳥居は、標高1000ｍぐらいの場所にある。
sen.e: Mihashira-torii located in Yamato Town (Gifu Prefecture) is at a place at an altitude of about 1,000 m.
Mihashira-torii located in Yamato Town (Gifu Prefecture) is at a place at an altitude of about 1,000 m.
Mihashira-torii located in Yamato-cho (Gifu Prefecture) is at a place at an altitude of about 1,000 m.

sen.j: 車が通れる道からは2ｋｍぐらいである。
sen.e: The mihashira-torii is about 2 km away from a road on which cars can run.
The mihashira-torii is about 2 km away from a road on which cars can run.
The mihashira-torii is about two kilometers away from a road on which cars can run.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 登山道は不明瞭なので、到達するのは非常に困難である。
sen.e: The mountain trails are not clear and, therefore, it is very difficult to reach the mihashira-torii.
The mountain trails are not clear and, therefore, it is very difficult to reach the mihashira-torii.
The mountain trails are not clear and, therefore, it is very difficult to reach the mihashira-torii.

sen.j: 鳥居があるだけで神社はない。
sen.e: There is only the mihashira-torii but is no shrine.
There is only the mihashira-torii but no shrine.
There is only the mihashira-torii but no shrine.

sen.j: 林道まで戻れば白山神社がある。
sen.e: Returning to a woodland path leads you to Hakusan-jinja shrine.
Returning to a woodland path leads you to Hakusan-jinja shrine.
Returning to a woodland path leads you to Hakusan-jinja Shrine.
sen.cmt: Shrine 大文字にしました。
